about.description:
Avahi is a system which facilitates service discovery on
a local network -- this means that you can plug your laptop or
computer into a network and instantly be able to view other people who
you can chat with, find printers to print to or find files being
shared. This kind of technology is already found in MacOS X (branded
'Rendezvous', 'Bonjour' and sometimes 'ZeroConf') and is very
convenient.

Avahi is a system which facilitates service discovery on
a local network -- this means that you can plug your laptop or
computer into a network and instantly be able to view other people who
you can chat with, find printers to print to or find files being
shared. This kind of technology is already found in MacOS X (branded
'Rendezvous', 'Bonjour' and sometimes 'ZeroConf') and is very
convenient.

This package contains utility modules to talk to Avahi with Python easier.

This package contains utility modules to talk to Avahi with Python easier.

Avahi is a system which facilitates service discovery on
a local network -- this means that you can plug your laptop or
computer into a network and instantly be able to view other people who

name: avahi
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "avahi" %}
{% set version = "0.7" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: "http://avahi.org/download/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  sha256: 57a99b5dfe7fdae794e3d1ee7a62973a368e91e414bd0dfa5d84434de5b14804

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - intltool
    - make
    - pkg-config
  host:
    - gdbm

outputs:
  - name: python-avahi
    script: python-avahi.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - intltool
        - make
        - pkg-config
      host:
        - dbus >=0.34
        - dbus-python >=0.34
        - expat
        - libdaemon >=0.14
        - pygobject
        - python
      run:
        - dbus-python >=0.34
        - pygobject
        - python
    test:
      imports:
        - avahi
    about:
      home: "http://avahi.org"
      dev_url: "https://github.com/lathiat/avahi"
      doc_url: "http://avahi.org/doxygen/html/"
      license: "LGPL-2.1-or-later"
      license_family: "LGPL"
      license_file: "LICENSE"
      summary: "Python utility package for Avahi"
      description: |
        Avahi is a system which facilitates service discovery on
        a local network -- this means that you can plug your laptop or
        computer into a network and instantly be able to view other people who
        you can chat with, find printers to print to or find files being
        shared. This kind of technology is already found in MacOS X (branded
        'Rendezvous', 'Bonjour' and sometimes 'ZeroConf') and is very
        convenient.

        This package contains utility modules to talk to Avahi with Python easier.

about:
  home: "http://avahi.org"
  dev_url: "https://github.com/lathiat/avahi"
  doc_url: "http://avahi.org/doxygen/html/"
  license: "LGPL-2.1-or-later"
  license_family: "LGPL"
  license_file: "LICENSE"
  summary: "Local network service discovery"
  description: |
    Avahi is a system which facilitates service discovery on
    a local network -- this means that you can plug your laptop or
    computer into a network and instantly be able to view other people who
    you can chat with, find printers to print to or find files being
    shared. This kind of technology is already found in MacOS X (branded
    'Rendezvous', 'Bonjour' and sometimes 'ZeroConf') and is very
    convenient.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duncanmmacleod
